name: rolesync
description: This cog allows you to sync roles across multiple Discord servers. It can be useful for managing roles across different communities or for keeping roles consistent across multiple servers.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing RoleSync!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
